text: wadhkuruu -ayha almjadlwn- waed allah lakum balzzafr b'ihda altayftyn: aleir wama tahmiluh min arzaq, 'aw alnfyr, wahu qital al'aeda' walantsar elyhm, wa'antum tuhibuwn alzzafr baleyr dun alqtal, wayurid allah 'an yuhiqa al'islam, wyuelyh bi'amrih 'iiaakum bqtal alkfar, wystasl alkafirin balhlak
